statements: ALTER TABLE Utilities.products ADD COLUMN price FLOAT;
ALTER TABLE Utilities.products DROP COLUMN category_id;
ALTER TABLE Utilities.categories ADD COLUMN description STRING;
ALTER TABLE utilities.electricity_meters ADD COLUMN last_reading FLOAT;
ALTER TABLE utilities.water_meters ADD COLUMN location STRING;
ALTER TABLE utilities.bill_payments ADD COLUMN payment_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE utilities.electricity_meters ADD COLUMN meter_type VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE utilities.water_meters DROP COLUMN location;
ALTER TABLE utilities.gas_meters MODIFY COLUMN installed_date TIMESTAMP;
ALTER TABLE Tool ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL
ALTER TABLE Tool DROP COLUMN quantity
ALTER TABLE Tool MODIFY COLUMN description VARCHAR
